Description:
One the whole family can enjoy!
This contemporary family home offers instant appeal with its modern façade, inviting interior and its fantastic location. Situated in Arcadia Estate in Officer which is highly desired for its affordability and family friendly environment.
Step inside this modern beauty and make your way to the heart of the home where the sun-drenched open plan kitchen awaits, complete with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, overhead cabinetry and breakfast bar adjoining to the spacious living, meals area then the covered outside pergola area.
This well-designed home accommodates four generous sized bedrooms and two separate living zones. The master bedroom with walk-in robe and ensuite. The additional three bedrooms both have built in robes and are conveniently serviced by the functional main bathroom and separate toilet.
Additional extras include; ducted heating, split system cooling, separate laundry, double remote-control garage with internal and external access, low maintenance gardens to the front and back all positioned on a 414m2 approx. allotment.
If location is what matters to you, then look no further set close to shops, public transport, easy freeway access, choice of schools and much more all minutes away from your front door step. Whether youre an investor, first home buyer or looking for a change, this home is sure to tick all the right boxes!

Description:
PERFECT IN EVERY WAY!
Located in the well-known Arena Estate, minutes to the local shopping centre, train station and freeway is this beautifully presented 10 year approx old townhouse built by AV Jennings.
Downstairs boasts spacious open plan living with neutral tones and high ceilings, a modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances including gas stove top, electric oven and dishwasher, meals area equipped with split system air conditioner, laundry and separate toilet.
Upstairs comprises of three bedrooms master has full ensuite and balcony and all bedrooms have built in robes, adjoining family room plus the main bathroom.
Outside is the timber decked entertainment area and a double garage with internal and remote access.
Whether you're in the market for your first home, looking for an investment or just love what the Arena Estate has to offer, this home is worth an inspection!
Internal area
142m²

Description:
Hamptons Family Entertainer Set on 700m2
Unsurpassed standards of style, quality and sophistication extend beautifully beyond the picturesque Hamptons profile of this stunning family home set on 700sqm approx. in Officers highly sought-after Timbertop estate, bordering Beaconsfield.
Expertly built with no expense spared boasting; a formal lounge/theatre room, spacious home office, an exquisite open plan chef's kitchen complemented by an island stone bench/breakfast bar, walk-in pantry and fitted with quality appliances including a tower wall oven, 900mm induction cooktop, dishwasher and impressive touch sensor & soft close drawer cabinetry. Overlooking the kitchen adjoins an expansive and sophisticated dining and family room with a built in gas fireplace that exudes a luxurious feel while radiating warmth and cosiness, as well as bringing indoor and outdoor living together via aluminium sliding stacker doors.
Upstairs contains an additional living/rumpus room, centred between all bedrooms including; a king-sized master retreat with a large walk through robe and complemented by a stylish ensuite featuring a double basin vanity with stone benchtops, separate toilet, wet room shower and a striking freestanding bathtub + TV, perfect for unwinding at the end of the day. The remaining 3 bedrooms have either built in robes, walk-in robes and/or study nooks, all serviced by the central bathroom, separate toilet and downstairs powder room.
Meticulously landscaped gardens, this home is enhanced for family lifestyle excellence and those that love to entertain comprising a covered alfresco, expansive timber decking, an exceptional built-in wood-fire pizza oven, spacious rear yard, basketball court and swimming pool with frameless glass fencing, right in time for Summer!
Completing this gracious home additional luxuries include zoned ducted heating, refrigerated air-conditioning, solar panels, infinity hot water system, video security alarm system, quality Hamptons style fixtures and fittings with matt black hardware & bespoke built-in cabinetry throughout, a large laundry and under staircase storage, 3 car garage/workshop with internal access + rear access.
Within only moments to cafes, parks/trails, schools, buses, Officer train station and M1 freeway, this charming home will suit the most discerning tastes as it effortlessly melds Hamptons design with high-end modern finishes.

Description:
Ready to Buy?
First home buyers, investors or downsizer/retiree, this beautifully designed home is perfectly suited to you. Beyond the exposed aggerate driveway and striking modern facade sits this well-maintained residence.
From the moment you enter you will feel at home with a sophisticated neutral palate throughout the living areas and kitchen. The galley style kitchen offers an impressive practical lay out and features quality stainless-steel appliances, stone benchtops, dishwasher, as well as the added large pantry.
Offering a master suite, complete with WIR and ensuite featuring a large shower and attractive tiles plus a further 2 stylish bedrooms both with BIR's serviced by a family bathroom plus separate toilet.
The duel access rear sliding doors open up to a beautifully covered outdoor entertaining area, perfect for those summer nights and drinks with family and friends. The double garage with remote door, internal access completes the well throughout design.
Situated on a 378m2 approx. block, this gorgeous home sits in the Arcadia Estate only a short stroll to shopping centres, parklands and Club Officer. With easy access to the M1 freeway and the Cardinia Road Train Station, this home has all you could want and more. If quality, elegance and class is what you're looking for then this is the perfect home for you. Arrange an inspection as this is this will sell quickly.

Description:
Titled Land!
Build your new dream tomorrow. This 400m2 (approx) flat block of land is located in Officer's ever-appealing Lavender Estate.
Officer has an exciting and vibrant hub of activity in its town centre with a buzzing town square, shops, restaurants, community centres and parklands.
There are a range of Primary and Secondary Schools around Officer.
Upgraded roads and freeways will link you to the city and surrounds, located approximately 40 minutes from Melbourne CBD.
Public transport will get you to surrounding suburbs and centres, and into the city. Just under 1 hour commute by Public Transport to Melbourne CBD.
The nearby Arena shopping centre allows you to live and shop local in Officer. The centre has a range of stores including Woolworths Supermarket, BWS Beer Wine Spirits and over 25 specialty stores.
If you are looking for Titled land and are ready to go, contact Megan Gordon Today!

Description:
Just Move In!
Situated in the popular Cherrington Estate is this neat as a pin three-bedroom abode. Only two years young, take advantage of owning a near new home without the stresses of building! Accommodating for first home buyers, downsizers or perfect for the savvy investor looking for a sure investment. The heart of the home is the hostess kitchen detailed with stone benchtop, stainless steel appliances, subway tile inspired feature, pantry and plenty of cupboard space. Adjacent the naturally lit family meals and family living area. The master includes ensuite as well as walk in robe. With two remaining bedrooms with sliding door built in robes and the sophisticated main bathroom. Absolutely nothing to do but move in!
Outdoors boasts alfresco area, spacious grassed area and low maintenance greenery. A wonderful atmosphere.
Features include; ducted heating throughout, split system cooling unit, internal and rear door access from single lock up garage and blocker blinds throughout. Within proximity to Beaconsfield village, prestigious schools, public transport, freeway access and all amenities.
Inspect today this one will not last long.
Photo I.D. required at all Open for Inspections.

Description:
Near New Home, Quality Area
Located in a wide street in the Potters Grove Estate with a huge park a few doors down is this modern 2 year old home with great appeal.
Property features include:
*3 good size bedrooms, master with ensuite (large shower) & walk in robe, other bedrooms with double built in robes & serviced by the main bathroom
*Large family/meals area with reverse cycle split system
*Kitchen with stone benches, large walk in pantry & stainless steel oven, gas hotplates, canopy rangehood & dishwasher
*High ceilings, gas ducted heating, timber laminate flooring, high quality security doors, double cupboard to laundry
*Alfresco under roofline, good size yard, landscaping
*Double garage with internal access to the home, remote door, built in shelving & water trough
Public transport, train station, M1 freeway access, quality schools & the upcoming Officer Town Centre are all within easy access.
Contact Geoff Powell on 0418 102 830.

Description:
Modern Lifestyle in the Perfect Location
Whether youre an investor looking to make some savvy rewards or the family who love low maintenance living, this 5-year young house, built by Home Buyers Centre, conveniently located in Potters Grove Estate Officer will be an inspection you will not want to miss!
The lower level offers a fully functional floorplan, leading you down the hall into the open plan kitchen, living and dining zone - offering oven/stove, dishwasher, breakfast bar, walk in pantry, cupboard storage and plenty of preparation space. The kitchen/meals are positioned in the perfect spot where it leads you out to the decked pergola area, making indoor/outdoor entertaining a breeze.
Upstairs you are welcomed into the second living zone, the master suite featuring a walk-in robe, double vanity ensuite, ceiling fan and split system cooling, while 2 of the remaining 3 bedrooms have built in robes which are serviced by the main bathroom and separate toilet. Extra comforts include ducted heating, split system cooling, powderoom downstairs and separate laundry.
The two and a half car garage will be sure to impress with extra space for the tradie to keep all their tools and the convenience of roller door external access and internal access into the house.
Location is like no other, situated between Beaconsfield shopping centre and Arena shopping centre Officer, kindergartens, cafes, restaurants, several schools, parkland, Princes highway and all transport.
Be quick to inspect as opportunities like this do not last long!

Description:
Oversized Family Living Space + Swimming Pool
CLOSING DATE SALE SAT 14th DEC at 4PM (Unless Sold Prior)
An exceptional home offering 37sq (approx.) of family living space, ideal for any growing family wanting a relaxed, low maintenance and community lifestyle.
Conveniently positioned in the sought after Timbertop Estate, close to shops, transport, parklands, sporting facilities, some of the most highly regarded schools at your doorstop and within easy access to the Monash Freeway, this quality home will quite simply make you the envy of all who visit.
With a list of desirable features simply too long to mention we can only do our best to try and paint a picture.
Boasting a wide entry hallway, formal lounge/theatre (fully wired), study/home office and an impressive, oversized kitchen featuring beautiful stone benches, an island breakfast bar, 900mm oven, dishwasher, ample cupboard space plus a large walk-in pantry, all of which overlooks a spacious dining and family room with sliding stacker doors bringing indoor and outdoor living together.
Upstairs comprises an additional lounge/kids play room which cleverly separates the childrens bedrooms away from the spacious parents retreat complimented by a double door entry, private balcony with uninterrupted views, walk-in dressing room and a full-ensuite including a double vanity with stone benchtops, walk-in shower and bathtub.
If you enjoy entertaining then look no further as this beautiful home comes fully equipped with a covered outdoor entertaining area overlooking a heated swimming pool and rear yard, perfect for large gatherings with friends and family, all year round.
Additional features include 9ft high ceilings, gas ducted heating, downstairs powder room, an oversized laundry, fully fenced yard, low maintenance, remote double lock up garage with internal access and the list goes on.
With everything you could ever want or need in the highest levels of quality family living, this property represents a fantastic opportunity for the astute buyer and an inspection we can assure you will not disappoint.

Description:
Arcadias Finest
Why build a house when you can buy a home ready to move in with nothing to do...the very clever floor plan and layout of this property has made sure this home has everything plus all the extras. Just 3 years young and built by Burbank, this home has a gorgeous appeal from the curb side all the way through to the backyard.
Comprising of three light filled and spacious bedrooms, the master suite has large windows, walk through fitted robe, ensuite with twin vanity and a double shower. The remaining two bedrooms have built in robes and are centrally located around the main bathroom and across from a large study/second living area.
The main hub of the home integrates kitchen, dining area and living area. The kitchen itself provides luxurious and elegant features including, freestanding 900mm oven & cooktop, dishwasher, stone benchtops and feature tile splashback. The lounge and dining area that are overlooked from the kitchen have so much space offering versatility to the room. The entire home has LED lights throughout.
Creature comforts and security is a must and this property has got you covered plus some with two split systems, ducted heating and ceiling fans throughout. For security there is a whopping total of 8 high quality security cameras throughout and electrical shutters that are great for security purposes and also do a good job of keeping the heat outside and keeping the house cool in summer months.
Moving outside you have low maintenance gorgeous gardens both front and back. Entertaining is taken care of with a fantastic alfresco ensuring pleasant outdoor dining in the summer months all whilst admiring your veggie patch. Also outside is a shed.
Positioned in the desirable Arcadia Estate, this home is within close to the following amenities; Cardinia Railway Station, Lakeside Square Town Centre, Officer Town Centre and the desirable Officer Club. The position offers further appeal by being walking distance to schools, childcare and medical centre, as well as easy access to the M1 freeway.
All information contained herein is gathered from relevant third party sources. We cannot guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided. Interested parties must rely solely on their own enquiries
Internal area
176.3m²

Description:
FOR THE GROWING FAMILY
***Closing date sale by 5pm Tuesday 26th November (IF NOT SOLD PRIOR)***
Look no further! Here is a home situated in one of Officer's most prominent locations, with the Arena Estate at your door step. A family haven that is sure to impress and ticking all the boxes for that growing family set on a 636m2 block.
Boasting:
Well-appointed stylish kitchen, with quality stainless steel appliances, stone benches and an abundance of bench and cupboard space.
Master bedroom with double vanity ensuite, separate toilet and generous walk in robe. The remaining 3 bedrooms, situated in a separate wing of the home, are all generous in size with spacious built in robes, serviced by the luxurious main bathroom.
Multiple living areas - comprising of a light filled open kitchen family/meals area and front formal lounge/optional study, rear rumpus/theatre room suiting all your family needs.
Outside entertainment area with a fully decked alfresco, water feature & landscaped gardens to your kids play ground, garden shed, underground sprinkler & drip system, sure to delight any buyer.
Added comforts include: gas ducted heating, x2 split system cooling units, laundry, double lock up garage with internal access, high ceilings and so much more.
Amenities close by include:
Arena Shopping Centre, medical centre, childcare, post office, Woolworths.
Lakeside, Saint Clares & Bridgewood Primary Schools.
Saint Francis Xavier College, Officer Secondary college.
Surrounding parklands and walking tracks.
Easy Freeway access & Cardinia train station

Description:
MAKE THIS YOURS!
The first thing to look for when searching for a property is location. Nestled in the Park Central Estate this home is one of Officers best. Situated amongst established homes, large playground, parkland and minutes to the M1 Freeway, shops, schools, Officers new town centre. This superb home with all the modern frills promises comfortable lifestyle for the most astute buyer.
On first impressions you are welcomed with modern façade and attractive gardens. You will be graced by the craftmanship of this contemporary design offering four bedrooms with master including WIR and full ensuite, main bathroom, separate laundry and remote controlled double garage. The tastefully designed open plan kitchen is fully equipped with high-quality stainless steel appliances, pantry and abundant storage and bench space. The open plan living/dining is full of natural light and flows centrally to the rest of the home. The home provides plenty of space for lively get-togethers with family and guests to entertain with the large decked undercover alfresco and landscaped spacious backyard.
This outstanding abode is a must to inspect before it's gone.

Description:
Eye Catching Elegance in Prestigious Location
Situated directly adjacent to acres of parkland, in the sought after Arena Estate is this young, ex display home of generous proportions. The interior is defined by a feeling of grandeur and sophisticated style. The family friendly floor plan features 4 bedrooms, including a spacious parents retreat, located on the lower level, formal lounge, complete with gas log fire and open plan kitchen, incorporating dining and family room. The 2nd level is ideal for the younger family members to enjoy, with main bathroom, 3 bedrooms and a retreat/theatre room. Features stunning, hardwood black butt floorboards throughout, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, security system, 3 toilets, ducted vacuum, guest powder room, direct entry to the double, remote garage and butlers pantry servicing the fully equipped kitchen.
Outdoors offers minimal maintenance with synthetic grass, and paving, a courtyard off the master and balcony off the kids retreat. The parkland and playground within steps, makes family gatherings stress free. Located within close proximity to shopping centres, schooling and the Monash Freeway will suit buyers seeking a convenient lifestyle.
Contact Amanda Charles

Style and space
Demonstrating undeniable style whilst offering inspired family friendly appeal, this beautiful home fuses a sleek blend of sophisticated living and comfortable family entertaining space. Located in the Arena Estate, it is conveniently located within walking distance to the Woolworths and surrounding Cafes and Shops. Featuring:
- 4 Spacious Bedrooms and study, master with ensuite and his and her robes
- High ceilings throughout with LED downlights, timber bi fold doors leading to a large alfresco
- Spacious living areas with separate Theatre/Rumpus room

This home needs to be seen to be appreciated, sitting on a generous 576 sqm block (approx.) it also offers easy freeway access and is central to transport. Don't miss out!

Description:
Premium Arcadia Corner Block!
Enter the ever-desirable Arcadia estate with this stunning 475sqm corner block. This slice of prime residential land is available for the taking and a very lucky purchaser has a rare opportunity to secure this titled allotment for an amazing price!.
Build your dream home in the enviable location or land bank for your future. TITLED LAND AND READY TO BUILD ON NOW!
This titled land features: -
Front: 15m(approx))
Depth: 32m(approx)
Total Land Area: 475m2
Orientation: North East
The Arcadia Estate is a master planned community, with your convenience being its priority. Set in the well-established Officer suburb, you'll find yourself close to Bridgewood Primary and Officer Secondary schools, sporting ovals, medical clinics and shopping centres.
You will also have great accessibility to public transport being only moments away from the Cardinia Road & Officer train stations and M1 freeway entrance.
With parklands, walking and bike trails all at your doorstep don't wait to secure this perfect allotment.

Description:
NEST OR INVEST
Ready to move into this four bedroom home is nicely positioned in close proximity to parks, gardens, walking tracks, a vast array of schools both public and private, shopping centres, as well as public transport making for easy living.
The family friendly floor plan boasts two living zones including formal lounge and open plan family room / dining room and fully appointed stone kitchen with quality appliances and scullery in the hub of the home. The master bedroom showcases en- suite and walk in robes, with BIRs to all secondary rooms. Desirable features include: ducted heating, S/S air conditioning, alarm system, double remote garage with direct entry, and the low maintenance garden completes this perfect family home.
So if you are a first home buyer, a family looking for a low maintenance comfortable living or an investor this property is certain to meet all your needs with an expected rental income of approx. $1,900pcm.
For further information contact Jeanine on 0438 332 411.

Ideally located in most popular "Arcadia Estate", is this titled block, offering 16 meters frontage perfect and ready to build a home to fit the entire family or offers great investment potential.

Description:
Flat land at Grandvue Officer
The Phone Code for this property is: 97440. Please quote this number when phoning or texting.
Looking for a buyer to nominate this block of land before it get titled in September 2019.
This land is located in Grandvue estate in Officer. As per the engineering plan attached fall on the block is approx 500mm.
Frontage 14m, width 32M, total land size 448 sqm.
This block of land is ideal for two story or single story house with four bedrooms or more. There are few building quotations customized from few popular builders in the area.
Grandvue Estate is ideally located and within easy reach of all life's necessities. A wide range of primary, secondary schools and colleges are at your doorstep, a proposed new shopping centre across the road and the Toomuc recreation reserve only minutes away.
Journey time to Melbourne's CBD via the M1 is approximately 45 minutes with train services running directly from the Officer station, a short 3 minute drive from Grandvue.

Description:
What A Great Location!
With new schools, shops, public transport, parks and kilometres of walking tracks all nearby, this immaculate 4 bedroom home is perfect for any growing family. Two separate living zones provide flexible living inside, whilst your choice of 2 separate alfresco dining areas are perfect for outdoor entertaining. The 414m2 allotment also provides for the perfect amount of lawn. The master bedroom features an ensuite and walk in robe, and all other bedrooms have built in robes. Tasteful décor and a neutral colour scheme throughout provide warmth and appeal, and mod cons such as split system air conditioning, stone benched kitchen with dishwasher, and a remote double garage with internal access make the home comfortable all year round. The propertys low maintenance design will also appeal to investors, so whether buying to live in or rent out, this is a home you can Inspect with confidence.
